curl — a “Swiss knife” command line tool and an exceptional library for transferring data with URLs.
trans-unit.target: curl —“瑞士刀”命令行工具，以及用于通过URL传输数据的出色库。

trans-unit.source: httpcat — a lower-level sister utility of HTTPie for constructing raw HTTP requests on the command line.
trans-unit.target: httpcat — HTTPie的低级姐妹实用程序，用于在命令行上构造原始HTTP请求。

trans-unit.source: All session data, including credentials, cookie data, and custom headers are stored in plain text. That means session files can also be created and edited manually in a text editor—they are regular JSON. It also means that they can be read by anyone who has access to the session file.
trans-unit.target: 所有会话数据（包括凭据，Cookie数据和自定义标头）均以纯文本存储。这意味着会话文件也可以在文本编辑器中手动创建和编辑-它们是常规JSON。这也意味着有权访问会话文件的任何人都可以读取它们。

trans-unit.source: All the other output options are under the hood just shortcuts for the more powerful
trans-unit.target: 所有其他输出选项都在幕后，只是更强大的快捷方式

trans-unit.source: Apply both colors and formatting. Default for terminal output.

trans-unit.source: As HTTPie is still under heavy development, the existing command line syntax and some of the
trans-unit.target: 由于HTTPie仍在重度开发中,现有的命令行语法和一些

trans-unit.source: As an optimization, the response body is downloaded from the server only if it’s part of the output. This is similar to performing a
trans-unit.target: 作为一种优化，仅当响应主体是输出的一部分时才从服务器下载响应主体。这类似于执行

trans-unit.source: Binary data is suppressed for terminal output, which makes it safe to perform requests to URLs that send back binary data. Binary data is suppressed also in redirected, but prettified output. The connection is closed as soon as we know that the response body is binary,
trans-unit.target: 二进制数据在终端输出中被抑制,这使得执行对发送回二进制数据的URL的请求是安全的。二进制数据在重定向但经过预处理的输出中也会被抑制。一旦我们知道响应体是二进制的,连接就会被关闭。

trans-unit.source: Build and print a request without sending it using offline mode:
trans-unit.target: 构建并打印请求，而无需使用离线模式发送请求：

trans-unit.source: By default, HTTP redirects are not followed and only the first response is shown:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,HTTP重定向不被跟踪,只显示第一个响应。

trans-unit.source: By default, HTTPie only outputs the final response and the whole response message is printed (headers as well as the body). You can control what should be printed via several options:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,HTTPie只输出最终的响应,而整个响应信息会被打印出来(头和正文)。你可以通过几个选项来控制打印的内容。

trans-unit.source: By default, every request HTTPie makes is completely independent of any previous ones to the same host.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,HTTPie发出的每个请求都是完全独立于之前对同一主机的请求的。

trans-unit.source: Currently HTTPie offers a single configurable option:

trans-unit.source: Disables output processing. Default for redirected output.

trans-unit.source: HTTP clients send cookies to the server as regular HTTP headers. That means, HTTPie does not offer any special syntax for specifying cookies — the usual
trans-unit.target: HTTP客户端将cookie作为常规HTTP标头发送到服务器。这意味着HTTPie不提供用于指定cookie的任何特殊语法-通常

trans-unit.source: HTTP headers are sorted by name.
trans-unit.target: HTTP头文件是按名称排序的。

trans-unit.source: HTTPie (pronounced aitch-tee-tee-pie) is a command line HTTP client. Its goal is to make CLI interaction with web services as human-friendly as possible. It provides a simple
trans-unit.target: HTTPie（发音为aitch-tee-tee-pie）是命令行HTTP客户端。其目标是使CLI与Web服务的交互尽可能对人类友好。它提供了一个简单的

trans-unit.source: HTTPie - a CLI, cURL-like tool for humans.
trans-unit.target: HTTPie-一个CLI,类似于人类的cURL工具。

trans-unit.source: HTTPie does several things by default in order to make its terminal output easy to read.

trans-unit.source: If your command includes some data request items, they are serialized as a JSON object by default. HTTPie also automatically sets the following headers, both of which can be overwritten:

trans-unit.source: Instead of a name, you can also directly specify a path to a session file. This allows for sessions to be re-used across multiple hosts:
trans-unit.target: 您也可以直接指定会话文件的路径,而不是名称。这允许会话在多个主机上重复使用。

It is a common gotcha that without this option HTTPie seemingly hangs. What happens is that when HTTPie is invoked for example from a cron job,

trans-unit.source: JSON is the lingua franca of modern web services and it is also the implicit content type HTTPie uses by default.
trans-unit.target: JSON是现代Web服务的通用语言，也是HTTPie默认使用的 隐式内容类型。

trans-unit.source: Python version 3.6 or greater is required.

trans-unit.source: Responses are downloaded and printed in chunks which allows for streaming and large file downloads without using too much memory. However, when colors and formatting is applied, the whole response is buffered and only then processed at once.
trans-unit.target: 响应以块的形式进行下载和打印，从而可以在不占用过多内存的情况下进行流式传输和大文件下载。但是，当应用 颜色和格式设置时，整个响应将被缓冲，然后立即进行处理。

Send multiple cookies (note the header is quoted to prevent the shell from interpreting the

trans-unit.source: Since we are only printing the HTTP headers here, the connection to the server is closed as soon as all the response headers have been received. Therefore, bandwidth and time isn’t wasted downloading the body which you don’t care about. The response headers are downloaded always, even if they are not part of the output
trans-unit.target: 由于我们仅在此处打印HTTP标头，因此一旦收到所有响应标头，便会关闭与服务器的连接。因此，下载您不关心的内容不会浪费带宽和时间。始终下载响应头，即使它们不是输出的一部分也是如此

trans-unit.source: Specify the auth mechanism. Possible values are
trans-unit.target: 指定认证机制。可能的值是

trans-unit.source: Streamed output by small chunks à la

Streaming becomes enabled even when the output is prettified: It will be applied to each line of the response and flushed immediately. This makes it possible to have a nice output for long-lived requests, such as one to the Twitter streaming API.
trans-unit.target: 即使在输出被预强化的情况下,流也会被启用。它将被应用到响应的每一行并立即刷新。这样就可以为长时间的请求提供一个很好的输出,比如对Twitter流媒体API的请求。

trans-unit.target: 提交表单与发送JSON请求非常相似。通常唯一的区别是添加

trans-unit.target: HTTPie使用的最后手段是通过请求URL和响应的组合来生成文件名。

trans-unit.source: The name of the HTTP method comes right before the URL argument:
trans-unit.target: HTTP方法的名称就在URL参数之前。

trans-unit.source: The only information HTTPie needs to perform a request is a URL.
trans-unit.target: HTTPie执行一个请求所需要的唯一信息是一个URL。

trans-unit.source: The output is flushed in much smaller chunks without any buffering, which makes HTTPie behave kind of like
trans-unit.target: 在没有任何缓冲的情况下,输出会以更小的块数进行刷新,这使得HTTPie的行为有点类似于

trans-unit.source: The reason is to make piping HTTPie’s output to another programs and downloading files work with no extra flags. Most of the time, only the raw response body is of an interest when the output is redirected.
trans-unit.target: 原因是使管道HTTPie的输出传递到另一个程序和下载文件时没有额外的标志。在大多数情况下，重定向输出时仅关注原始响应主体。

trans-unit.source: The server may specify the filename in the optional
The standard behaviour of HTTP clients is to normalize the path portion of URLs by squashing dot segments as a typically filesystem would:
trans-unit.target: HTTP客户端的标准行为是通过压制点段来规范URL的路径部分,就像通常的文件系统一样。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the command arguments closely corresponds to the actual HTTP requests sent over the wire. It has the advantage that it’s easy to remember and read. It is often possible to translate an HTTP request to an HTTPie argument list just by inlining the request elements. For example, compare this HTTP request:
trans-unit.target: 命令参数的语法与通过网络发送的实际HTTP请求非常接近。它具有易于记忆和阅读的优点。仅通过内联请求元素，通常就可以将HTTP请求转换为HTTPie参数列表。例如，比较以下HTTP请求：

trans-unit.source: The universal method for passing request data is through redirected
trans-unit.target: 传递请求数据的通用方法是通过重定向的

trans-unit.source: There are a couple of default headers that HTTPie sets:
trans-unit.target: 有几个HTTPie设置的默认头文件。

trans-unit.source: There are a few different request item types that provide a convenient mechanism for specifying HTTP headers, simple JSON and form data, files, and URL parameters.
trans-unit.target: 有几种不同的请求项类型，它们提供了一种方便的机制来指定HTTP标头，简单的JSON和表单数据，文件和URL参数。

trans-unit.source: There are also two shortcuts that allow you to quickly disable and re-enable sorting-related format options (currently it means JSON keys and headers):
trans-unit.target: 还有两个快捷键可以让你快速禁用和重新启用排序相关的格式选项(目前是指JSON键和头)。

trans-unit.source: There are three mutually exclusive ways through which HTTPie determines the output filename (with decreasing priority):
trans-unit.target: HTTPie有三种相互排斥的方式来决定输出文件名(优先级递减)。

trans-unit.source: They are key/value pairs specified after the URL. All have in common that they become part of the actual request that is sent and that their type is distinguished only by the separator used:
trans-unit.target: 它们是在URL后指定的键/值对。所有的共同点是,它们都成为实际发送的请求的一部分,它们的类型仅由使用的分隔符来区分。
